channel.title: Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594
channel.description:
Can anyone tell me how to change the ip when i start runserver.bat
When i open it it say starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594
How to change it to my ip or my no-ip adress??? plz help me! Cuz when i start it i can only log on it bi using 0.0.0.0 in new ip, how to log on my serv using my ip or no-ip adress??? please help me!

item.title: Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594
item.dc:creator: @TKB_Wizard TKB_Wizard
item.description:
@TKB_Wizard wrote:

Kk I found the solution… For those who got the same problem, go on port fowarding find your router, and select default guide, and do what they say!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594
item.dc:creator: @future future
item.description:
@future wrote:

Thats not your I.P if your using a router you need to forward port 43594

To check your I.P open a fresh Internet Explorer or firefox wat ever u use. go to www.myipaddress.com then it will show ur i.p and to make a no-ip address go to www.no-ip.com and work from there.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594
item.dc:creator: @TKB_Wizard TKB_Wizard
item.description:
@TKB_Wizard wrote:

I dont have portfowarding or triggering, all i have is :
LAN Setting
Wireless
Status
Routing
Access
Management
Tools
Wizard

Read full topic

item.title: Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Majorclucker all u have to do for people to join is to thave the server up and tell people the ip and they put that in and log on.

tkb_wizard go to start>run then in run type ipconfig and look for your gateway ip which i think it is 192.168.1.1 or what ever once u have the ip open a internet explorer page and paste that ip in there and a box will come up and ask u to log in, the default name and pass is ether name: admin pass: admin or name: admin Pass: pass or password. Once u get in look on the right or left which side that has all the menus and look for portfowarding or triggering click on that and click add custom service and fill that out and click add.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Ok this is how i got people to join mine and it worked, firs make a hamachi server then the people will have to join that to egt on then tell them your ip above your name on hamachi and all they have to do it put that in on the moparscape ip thing and log in.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594
item.dc:creator: @pancholip pancholip
item.description:
@pancholip wrote:

do you have a router? if so its blocking out your friends. you need to go to portforward.com, pick your routers brand and name and view the default guide, set port forwardin to port 43594. the 0.0.0.0.43594 is absolutly normal

Read full topic

item.title: Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594
item.dc:creator: @TKB_Wizard TKB_Wizard
item.description:
@TKB_Wizard wrote:

But how do i get people play on it?
I tell them my IP and they should get on it?

I tried that, he tried with my No-IP one and it didn’t work… He tried too with my IP…
How do i make it work plz?

Read full topic

item.title: Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594

item.description:
@ipkyouhaha wrote:

when it says starting testscape on server 0.0.0.0:43594, that means that its working right… if you edited your runserver.bat with your server name, it should work fine.
